outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use torify for privacy. Experimental
url.comment: The url that provides the fear and greed information
dataDirectory.comment: The path to store downloaded files. A subfolder for caching fearandgreed resources will be created if its doesn't exist
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 320
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorDataValue.comment: The color of the data values for each entry expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMovingAverage.comment: The color to use for the moving average line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorGraphLineLight.comment: The color to use for the left and bottom borders of the plot graph, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorGraphLineDark.comment: The color to use for the right and top borders of the blot graph, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
